participant_1.background:
I sometimes neglect to give my dog enough attention.
I am a student who is trying to stay positive and focus on my studies.
i love to paint pictures.
i have always had long hair.
i love to cut down trees.

participant_2.background:
I like to use websites that help me learn about music and color theory.
i also eat too much french fries.
I want to take my uniform off and relax.
My longest relationship was with my wife, but she doesn't like me anymore.
I am single, but I am happy and content with my life, because I have my writing to keep me busy.

content.text: I am a student who is trying to stay positive and focus on my studies. I also like to paint pictures.
That is cool. I love to use websites that help me learn about music and color theory.
That is really interesting! I am always looking for new ways to learn about painting.
I also like to take french fries and make them into a delicious snack by adding some ranch dressing and cheese to them.
That sounds really good! I might have to try that sometime.
I am also single, but I am happy and content with my life, because I have my writing to keep me busy.
That is awesome! I am glad that you are happy.
Thank you! I hope that you are also happy and content with your life.
I am doing well! I am looking forward to a great weekend.
That is great to hear! I am also looking forward to a great weekend.
I hope that you have a wonderful weekend!
Thank you! I hope that you have a wonderful weekend too!
